result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Filed by State. kma

8:31 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K. Anderson, Attorney Karl E Anderson in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney A.W. Schutte in court for Paula Ellen Diamond. Defendant Paula Ellen Diamond appeared by video. Defendant Michael Ray Overall appeared by video. Attorney Jon Elton Stanek appeared by video for Michael Ray Overall. INCLUDES 22CF169 and 21CF532. DA Anderson states this case is proceeding to trial, nothing further to take up today. Court notes scheduling order in place and previously scheduled FPT and JT. Adjourned: 8:32 AM. kma

Order for payment on August 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
DE pd July's pymt on 7/1/22 - NOH generated for next pymt due in Aug. jaf
for Consolidation includes 21CF532 and 22CF169. Granted and Signed by RMW on 07/15/22. arc

10:45  AM CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K Kittel.  Attorney Michelle Brekken in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Paula Ellen Diamond in court via zoom w/Attorney A.W. Schutte who was in person. Matter is called with 22CF532 for which Defendant Michael Ray Overall appears with Attorney Jon Elton Stanek both via zoom. Court notes the States Motion to Consolidate these matters for purposes of trial. No objections by Atty Schutte or Atty Stanek. Court consolidates for purposes of trial only. Atty Stanek would like to set for trial, Atty Schutte still needs Discovery, would like trial set as well. Attys ask for 2 days. All FPT submissions due not later than 11/11/22. Adjourned: 11:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on November 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Jury trial on December 5, 2022 at 08:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Motion hearing on July 15, 2022 at 10:45 am.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle DA:  Karl E Anderson   DF ATTY:  Daniel James Chapman and  DF:  Paula Ellen Diamond appeared via zoom. Case called at 3:01 p.m. Court notes this matter is set for a hearing on a motion to join with 21CF532. Meanwhile, received a Motion to Withdraw as counsel filed by Atty Chapman. Atty Chapman gives argument. Filed motion per DE's request. DE is requesting Court appoint new counsel. Court will grant Atty Chapman's motion and will appoint new counsel. Atty Chapman to submit bill. Court schedules. Address confirmed. Zoom approved. Bond continues. Court adjourned at 3:07 p.m.  Motion hearing scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Order Granting Atty Chapman to Withdraw. km          to RMW on 6/3

to Withdraw as Counsel. Filed by Atty Chapman. km

Neither party objects to Motion to Join. Court schedules for a motion hearing. Zoom approved. Address confirmed. Any objection to be filed a week in advance.
